language.description: Components to send emails to users, contact admins and send personal messages
language.read_pms: Click here to read your Private Messages

specs.title: Hide on main menu?
specs.description: If Yes, the link to the contact form will be hidden on the main menu.

specs.title: Allow everyone to email me
specs.description: By default, everyone can send emails to our users using the contact form without exposing email addresses. If you don't want to receive emails from everyone (except mods/admins), turn this setting off.

specs.title: Email me on post comments
specs.description: Receive an email when someone else comments your post (it doesn't apply to replies)

specs.title: Email me on comment replies
specs.description: Receive an email when someone else replies your comments

specs.title: Email me when new posts are published
specs.description: Mods/admins only Receive an email with the excerpt and some statistics. Applies to posts from everyone except your own.

specs.title: Email me when new media items are published
specs.description: Mods/admins only Receive an email with the description and a preview of the media item being published (if possible). Applies to submissions from everyone except your own.

specs.title: Email me when new comments are added
specs.description: Mods/admins only Receive an email with the comment and the context. Applies to comments from everyone except your own.

for_author.subject: A comment has been submitted to your post titled "{$title}" on {$website_name}
for_author.body:
Greetings, {$author}! {$comment_sender} has commented on your post {$post_title}:

{$comment}

Note: actual content may differ due to email limitations.

Do not reply to this email! Click on any of the next actions:

  • Reply to {$comment_sender}.
  • Report as spam or inappropiate.
  • Edit your preferences to disable these notifications.
  • Blacklist this email address so no emails from us are sent to it.

Regards,
{$website_name}

for_mods.subject: [{$website_name}/Moderators] Comment submitted to {$author}'s post "{$title}"
for_mods.body:
{$comment_sender} has commented on {$author}'s post {$post_title}:

{$comment}

Note: actual content may differ due to email limitations.

Available mod/admin actions:

  • Add a reply to the comment.
  • Flag as spam or inappropiate.
  • Reject the comment.
  • Delete it (send it to the trash can).
  • Edit your preferences to disable these notifications.

Regards,
{$website_name}
